s.text: make it impossible to conclusively attribute my feeling better to the more rapid and effective hydration I was receiving from the sports drinks.
Are you worried at all about the amount of artificial flavors and colors that you're ingesting?

The new trend in drinks seems to be away from the traditional red-orange-yellow colors and fake-fruit flavors and toward the blue end of the color spectrum and the dropping of all pretense of fruitiness.
